channel.title: How to make a client to download! Just read (repost with more detail)
channel.description:
I need to make a client that others can download and connect to my server, Not choose an ip and connect to that server. i have a cleint that has all my id's correct but i want to know how to edit it to connect to my no-ip adress and make it so they cant edit it. (like the ones you download where theirs a run file.)
PS. 1) Please make step by step instructions. ITS A DELTa server

item.title: How to make a client to download! Just read (repost with more detail)
item.dc:creator: @Abandoned_Dreams Abandoned Dreams
item.description:
@Abandoned_Dreams wrote:

[quote=“litltntking, post:3, topic:378369”]Delta.[/quote]Go Into, GUI.java And Search “127.0.0.1” or “0.0.0.0”
And Replace All Of Them With Your IP Adress Your You No-Ip.com IP Adress… Then Save And Compile…
Right Click On Client File… And Click “add To Archive” Then Uplaod That File To “Mediafire.com” Or What Ever…
There You Go.

Read full topic
